extendedInfo.description: Figure out all the ways you can play with Chuck... for better or for worse!Don't let his cute smile trick you... he's no pretty boy! Hold your phone and shake him, punch him, throw him around, show him who's in charge!A new star will light up each time you find a new way to interact with Chuck. Solve the riddles for hints on what to do next! Oh, and watch out for crazy pranks... our cheeky pal can be pretty irreverent...Features:- Hilarious animation- Unprecedented user interaction and game experience- Fantastic environments and sounds- Online sharing of wacky snapshots and messagesFind out all the fun stuff you and your friends can make Chuck do!Gadgets, hints, and more on www.cheekychuck.com

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love this game u actully can do very cool things but please help at kendama
reviews.author: Rawan Samy

reviews.title: Nice game. 1 star left
reviews.comment: Its a nice game. Well made but having trouble with the \"kendama\" trick. I dont know how to do it. Please help???
reviews.author: Daniella De Jesus

reviews.title: Bugs need fixed.
reviews.comment: Cant change scenes on my LG 4glte.  Chuck doesn\'t realize i left a finger print, which is actually really hard to do. Can\'t smash his feet or punch him. Get these things fixes and i will give it more stars.
reviews.author: Em Drake

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: To make him fly swing by his hair for a while then let go, pinch his body with you fingers from all directions. The kendama trick is to flip you device right until you get back to your devices proper orientation. You can also tip it left
reviews.author: Alexis Duffy

reviews.title: 2 stars left!
reviews.comment: I dont understand how to do the kendama or multi touch thing. I tried to tilt right for kendama but he just falls. I try to multi tuch and it kisses him. And hints dont make sense. Yeah theres anothet one that says its to bright turn it into nigght or something
reviews.author: Victoria Kodken

reviews.title: Need ne
reviews.comment: Looks like he can fly ? No ease let out the gas?
reviews.author: charne scholtz

reviews.title: Going mad
reviews.comment: Kendama please help
reviews.author: Tillie Mint

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: I dont get riddles make hints and I dont know wat to do I got 5 stars left
reviews.author: Melvin Watson

reviews.title: Man, I love this game!
reviews.comment: You can make him clean your screen by pressing your fingers against the screen
reviews.author: Ale Esparza

reviews.title: Cheeky chuck
reviews.comment: This game is so boring
reviews.author: Rasheda Mobley

reviews.title: Love Love Love
reviews.comment: This game! I have all stars except one. (hands on the ground... Place one finger on his head the other on his feet and flip him over) I still can\'t figure out the kendama thing though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So awsme
reviews.comment: The rain is very easy you just swipe3 fingers down chuck...its just tha I dunno how to make him swing and that\'s all Best game ever!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: The game is okay, though i got bored of it after 10 minutes..
reviews.author: Meme Alali

reviews.title: Fun but frustrating
reviews.comment: I dunno how to make him swing. So hard :\'( but overall it very fun and challenging. My phone might break one day because of this game lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun And Hard
reviews.comment: I loved it at first when I played it, it was also easy when I tried to find the moves, but later I didn\'t know how to discover the other moves, because the hints don\'t tell you much. But over all, it\'s very interesting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hints and things....
reviews.comment: swipe 3 fingers simultaneously after a while or so it will rain, shake phone up and down for a while to make him dizzy,shake phone side to side not too fast and not too slow to make him swing on a vine,Swipe your hand around him in a circle to unlock a motion,Tilt your phone to make him fall, grab him by the shirt and the hair,press down on belly to fart,touch 2 times to punch,push down on him to flatten,tilt phone back then forward, kiss the screen,do a circle motion around his face for a while
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loads of fun
reviews.comment: Not only is this game a bunch of fun but the developers are fantastic as well. Try the free one if you don\'t believe me but once you have please support these guys and buy the pay version. These people deserve it truly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Im stuck... Help?
reviews.comment: Two more stars n all it says is runing biking hitting the gym ... Which other way makes u slim. I already pulled him thin though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but frustrating
reviews.comment: I really like it when I figure out a knew trick. But gosh, super hard to figure out, and the clues don\'t help you much. I don\'t want the clues to tell me exactly what to do, but the word clue means clue not riddle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ehh..
reviews.comment: I love this game, the graphics and all. But I do need help I don\'t get any clues or riddles and I just have 6 stars left. So it\'s kind of frustrating because you can\'t figure out more ways to bother him.
reviews.author: Esmeralda Rosales
